title: Gallery | Semantic Scholar Academic Graph API
markdown:
# Gallery | Semantic Scholar Academic Graph API

-   [Overview](/product/api)
-   [Tutorial](/product/api/tutorial)
-   [Documentation](https://api.semanticscholar.org/api-docs/)
-   [Gallery](/product/api/gallery)
-   [Cite the Paper](https://www.semanticscholar.org/paper/The-Semantic-Scholar-Open-Data-Platform-Kinney-Anastasiades/cb92a7f9d9dbcf9145e32fdfa0e70e2a6b828eb1)

We’re excited to have partners join in on our mission to accelerate scientific breakthroughs by building extraordinary tools on the Semantic Scholar APIs. Explore these use cases and get inspired for your next project!

If you’d like to add your project to the gallery, please fill out [this form](/product/api/gallery-submission).

Semantic Scholar API

API Gallery

We’re excited to have partners join in on our mission to accelerate scientific breakthroughs by building extraordinary tools on the Semantic Scholar APIs. Explore these use cases and get inspired for your next project!

If you’d like to add your project to the gallery, please fill out this form.

CiteSpy

Code extension that scrapes paper titles, summaries, and links and displays them in Visual Studio Code

Mihir Panchal

Researcher Collab

Mobile app designed to simplify finding research partners, create a global academic network, and explore trending topics in your field

Itır Ceren Morcote Santos

DocuSurf

Empowering researchers to customize and automate their literature review workflows using a team of AI agents

Tin En Hao

LitSift

An intuitive implementation for searching Semantic Scholar and saving filtered results as BibTeX/CSV

Jaisal E. K.

StudyRecon

Streamline your literature review process by mapping out the research landscape and organizing relevant studies

Konrad Rzezniczak

Epoch Database

The most comprehensive database of historical and state-of-the-art machine learning models since the dawn of AI

Robi Rahman

Liner

Get instant answers to questions, deep dive into any topic, and summarize documents in seconds

Alexander Seokjean Yoon

EduWriter AI

AI writing tool equipped to generate various types of academic papers

EduWriter AI

Undermind

Precise, and comprehensive search for complex research topics

Joshua Ramette

Afforai

AI-powered research assistant that helps you search, summarize, and translate knowledge

Alec Nguyen

Epsilon

AI search engine for academic research

Eshan Agarwal

Paperlib

A powerful opensource academic paper management tool

Changrui Chen

Wonders AI

AI search engine that helps you learn and answer questions directly from credible scientific sources

Robin Mehta

scienceOS

A chat-based agent supporting scientists in driving discoveries through AI integration with literature research

Henri Max Deda

Papelist

Discover and study a domain with the top influential research papers

Constantin Dumitrascu

Textero AI

Improve your academic writing with Textero AI Essay Writer

Nick Yasynskyi

GenText AI

AI assistant for writing accurate research papers within MS Word that minimizes hallucinations

Alex Charles

Elicit

Analyze research papers at superhuman speed

Andreas Stuhlmüller

Consensus

Ask a question and get answers backed by multiple papers generated by AI

Eric Olson

Citrus Search

Get an overview of relevant articles in a research field with a single search

Jonas Mayer, Maximilian Palmer

Sourcely

Find and summarize academic sources for students and academics writing their essays and papers

Elman Mansimov

Better Together

Input a corpus id or a query to find a list of similar papers with citation counts

Kenneth Church

Scispace

Condense hours of reading into just minutes while generating literature reviews of exceptional quality

Saikiran Chandha

Sciety

Find preprints recommended and reviewed by trusted groups of researchers

Daniel Ecer

HeyOctopus

Generate paper learning paths to quickly enter new fields of science and share your learning journeys

Jonathan Klimesch

Connected Papers

A visual tool to help researchers and practitioners find and explore academic papers

Eddie Smolyansky

S2QA: Question Answering on research papers from Semantic Scholar

Get answers to research questions from 200M+ papers

Shaurya Rohatgi

Join the Semantic Scholar API Community Slack Channel

Get Started
Stay Connected With Semantic Scholar
What Is Semantic Scholar?

Semantic Scholar is a free, AI-powered research tool for scientific literature, based at Ai2.
